input.title: CyberDrain Improved Partner Portal
input.message: Welcome to the future of Microsoft 365 management! Please click here to complete your CIPP registration. The invitation expires on {{ CTX.invite.properties.expiresOn|format_datetime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%s %Z') }}. Make sure to log in with your Microsoft Partner email: {{ CTX.email_address }}, the invite is specific to that account. Once you've accepted the invite, head on over to https://{{ CTX.domain }} to get started. If you have questions about the application, https://docs.cipp.app is a good starting point.
input.subject: CIPP Invitation

input.message:
*CyberDrain Improved Partner Portal*

Welcome to the future of Microsoft 365 management!

Please click <{{ CTX.invite.properties.invitationUrl }}|here> to complete your CIPP registration. The invitation expires on {{ CTX.invite.properties.expiresOn|format_datetime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%s %Z') }}.

Make sure to log in with your Microsoft Partner email: {{ CTX.email_address }}, the invite is specific to that account.

Once you've accepted the invite, head on over to https://{{ CTX.domain }} to get started. If you have questions about the application, https://docs.cipp.app is a good starting point.
